name: Diana Cuno
description: Diana Cunowas a genetics engineer atBiotechnicainCyberpunk 2077. Together with Dr.Joanne Koch, she was involved inProject Nightingale, a ruthless medical experiment causing numerous casualties. After information on the project leaks to the public, Dr. Koch puts all blame on Diana. As she liquidated witnesses of secret research herself before, Diana knows she is on a hit list. She tries to escapeNight City, including a futile plea toWakako Okadato have her extracted, but is murdered byArasakagoons on behalf of Biotechnica as she attempted to leave the city.
